name: Zazmo Arcade Pack
description:
Z.A.P. takes themes and game ideas from games we love, revises them and EXPANDS on them. While they may look familiar to you we are working to add value and most of all fun for you and a friend! That’s right folks – this is not only about you but you and a buddy!

Two-Player Co-Op and Competitive Play

As well as single player all the games in the Zazmo Arcade Pack will have both co-op and single player variations. Additionally we will have a head to head version of our game Breakdown.

List of games included with (working) titles:

Breakdown Deluxe – inspired by classic arcade game Breakout (head to head, single player and co-op)
Mazard Deluxe – a Wizard of Wor style game (from the same game in the early 80’s) – single player and co-op
Tank Battle Deluxe (a Combat Style tank battle) - single player and co-op
Rob’s Adventure Deluxe – a Shooter/SHUMP type game – single player and co-op
Last Stand (working title) – a game inspired from the 80’s arcade classic Rip-Off – single player and co-op

Samples of what is in store for you!

Our game Tank War will get a co-op version in addition to the single player


Mazard will be also getting a co-op version!


Breakdown gets a co-op AND head to head version!


Rob's Adventure gets a co-op AND head to head version!


Check out this and more in the trailers and updates we will be posting!

Thanks for stopping by and as always - remember to live your dreams!
